author: sbailliez
msg: Enhance lookup path so that it works automagically with 1.x and 2.x versions...

author: donaldp
msg: Make LogKit an optional part not required by default frontend. Replace it with a basic console logger instead

author: donaldp
msg: LogLevel is not universal enough to be used in the api package so moving it back into the framework package

author: donaldp
msg: Move the generic log() methods back into LogLevel. The reason for this is to remove yet another Avalon dependency from the api package.

I also think that usage of the log() methods except in really rare circumstances leads to poor programming idioms. Hopefully there will only be a handful of tasks that use it (like <log/>) and thus it is not universal enough to be in the TaskContext.
